snippet: President Mahinda Rajapaksa on Friday rejected calls for an international investigation into accusations of massacres and human rights violations during the final phase of Sri Lanka’s civil war, which ended in 2009.
abstract: Sri Lankan Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa rejects calls for an international investigation into accusations of massacres and human rights violations during the final phase of the country's civil war, which ended in 2009.
